title: "Enjoy the Silence" by Depeche Mode (1920's Jazz Age Cover) ft. Chloe Feoranzo
description:
“Enjoy the Silence” by Depeche Mode (1920's Jazz Age Cover) by Postmodern Jukebox ft. Chloe Feoranzo.
Get The Song: http://pmjlive.com/enjoythesilence | See PMJ Live on Tour: http://www.pmjtour.com
Subscribe: http://bit.ly/subPMJ | Shop PMJ Music / Merch: http://www.shoppmj.com
Follow us on Spotify: http://www.pmjlive.com/pmjspotify
Sign up to get videos to your inbox: http://www.pmjlive.com/newsletter

Fan favorite singing clarinetist Chloe Feoranzo returns to help us take a Depeche Mode classic back to 1920s New Orleans, in this Jazz Age reimagining of the 1990 hit, “Enjoy The Silence.”
